org.eclipse.paho.android.service

Interface MessageStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseMessageStore

    public interface MessageStore

    Mechanism for persisting messages until we know they have been received

    • A Service should store messages as they arrive via storeArrived(String, String, MqttMessage).
    • When a message has been passed to the consuming entity, discardArrived(String, String) should be called.
    • To recover messages which have not been definitely passed to the consumer, getAllArrivedMessages(String) is used.
    • When a clean session is started clearArrivedMessages(String) is used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  MessageStore.StoredMessage
      External representation of a stored message
